property.name: oracleTimeBetweenEvictionRunsMillis
property.desc: 隔多久才进行一次检测，检测需要关闭的空闲连接

property.name: oracleMinEvictableIdleTimeMillis
property.desc: 连接在池中最小生存的时间

property.name: oracleTestOnBorrow
property.desc: 从数据库连接池中取得连接时，对其的有效性进行检查

property.name: oracleTestOnReturn
property.desc: 用完连接放回连接池时是否对有效性进行检查

property.name: oracleMaxPoolPreparedStatementPerConnectionSize
property.desc: 打开PSCache，并且指定每个连接上PSCache的大小

property.name: msgReaderIdle
property.desc: 读通道等待时间-单位:秒

property.name: msgWriterIdle
property.desc: 写通道等待时间-单位:秒

property.name: msgReceiveBufferSize
property.desc: 接收缓冲区的大小-单位:byte

property.name: msgSendBufferSize
property.desc: 发送缓冲区的大小-单位:byte

property.name: equipmentSubmit
property.desc: 设备状态更新批量提交数

property.name: updateOfflineStatusSubmit
property.desc: 更新上下线状态提交数

property.name: vehicheInfoAll
property.desc: 全量更新间隔-单位:分钟

property.name: vehicheInfoOffset
property.desc: 车辆更新时间偏移-单位:分钟

config.property: SELECT V.VID,TERMINAL_STATUS_VALTYPE,MIN_TERMINAL_STATUS,MAX_TERMINAL_STATUS,GPS_STATUS_VALTYPE,MIN_GPS_STATUS,MAX_GPS_STATUS,E_WATER_TEMP_VALTYPE,MIN_E_WATER_TEMP,MAX_E_WATER_TEMP,EXT_VOLTAGE_VALTYPE,MIN_EXT_VOLTAGE,MAX_EXT_VOLTAGE,OIL_PRESSURE_VALTYPE,MIN_OIL_PRESSURE,MAX_OIL_PRESSURE,BRAKE_PRESSURE_VALTYPE,MIN_BRAKE_PRESSURE,MAX_BRAKE_PRESSURE,BRAKEPAD_FRAY_VALTYPE,MIN_BRAKEPAD_FRAY,MAX_BRAKEPAD_FRAY,OIL_ALARM_VALTYPE,MIN_OIL_ALARM,MAX_OIL_ALARM,ABS_BUG_VALTYPE,MIN_ABS_BUG,MAX_ABS_BUG,COOLANT_LEVEL_VALTYPE,MIN_COOLANT_LEVEL,MAX_COOLANT_LEVEL,AIR_FILTER_CLOG_VALTYPE,MIN_AIR_FILTER_CLOG,MAX_AIR_FILTER_CLOG,MWERE_BLOCKING_VALTYPE,MIN_MWERE_BLOCKING,MAX_MWERE_BLOCKING,FUEL_BLOCKING_VALTYPE,MIN_FUEL_BLOCKING,MAX_FUEL_BLOCKING,EOIL_TEMPERATURE_VALTYPE,MIN_EOIL_TEMPERATURE_ALARM,MAX_EOIL_TEMPERATURE_ALARM,RETARDER_HT_ALARM_VALTYPE,MIN_RETARDER_HT_ALARM,MAX_RETARDER_HT_ALARM,EHOUSING_HT_ALARM_VALTYPE,MIN_EHOUSING_HT_ALARM,MAX_EHOUSING_HT_ALARM,AIR_PRESSURE_VALTYPE,MIN_AIR_PRESSURE,MAX_AIR_PRESSURE FROM TB_VSTATUS_REF S INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON S.VS_REF_ID = V.VS_REF_ID WHERE V.ENABLE_FLAG='1' AND V.VEHICLE_STATE='2'

SELECT V.VEHICLE_NO,S.SUID,V.VID AS VID,V.PLATE_COLOR AS PLATE_COLOR_ID,M.COMMADDR AS T_IDENTIFYNO, T.OEM_CODE AS OEMCODE, T.TMODEL_CODE, T.TID, V.VIN_CODE, V.ENT_ID FROM TB_SIM M INNER JOIN TR_SERVICEUNIT S ON S.SID = M.SID INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON V.VID = S.VID INNER JOIN TB_TERMINAL T ON T.TID = S.TID WHERE COMMADDR IS NOT NULL AND V.ENABLE_FLAG = '1'AND T.ENABLE_FLAG = '1'

SELECT V.VEHICLE_NO,S.SUID,V.VID AS VID,V.PLATE_COLOR AS PLATE_COLOR_ID,M.COMMADDR AS T_IDENTIFYNO,T.OEM_CODE AS OEMCODE,T.TMODEL_CODE,T.TID,V.VIN_CODE,V.ENT_ID FROM TB_SIM M INNER JOIN TR_SERVICEUNIT S ON S.SID = M.SID INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON V.VID = S.VID INNER JOIN TB_TERMINAL T ON T.TID = S.TID WHERE COMMADDR IS NOT NULL AND V.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND T.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND (M.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR M.CREATE_TIME >= ? OR S.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR S.CREATE_TIME >= ? OR V.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR V.CREATE_TIME >= ? OR T.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR T.CREATE_TIME >= ? )

property.name: sql_allVehicle3GInfo
property.desc: 更新3g手机号对应的车辆缓存信息SQL

config.property: SELECT S.SUID,V.VID AS VID,V.PLATE_COLOR AS PLATE_COLOR_ID,M.COMMADDR AS T_IDENTIFYNO,T.OEM_CODE AS OEMCODE,T.TMODEL_CODE, T.TID, VEHICLE_NO, TD.DVR_SIMNUM, V.VIN_CODE, V.ENT_ID FROM TB_SIM M INNER JOIN TR_SERVICEUNIT S ON S.SID = M.SID INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON V.VID = S.VID INNER JOIN TB_TERMINAL T ON T.TID = S.TID INNER JOIN KCPT.TB_DVR TD ON TD.DVR_ID = S.DVR_ID WHERE TD.DVR_SIMNUM IS NOT NULL AND V.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND T.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND T.TER_STATE = 2

property.name: sql_incrementalVehicle3GInfo
property.desc: 更新3g手机号对应的车辆缓存信息SQL

config.property: SELECT TD.DVR_SIMNUM, S.SUID,V.VID AS VID,V.PLATE_COLOR AS PLATE_COLOR_ID,M.COMMADDR AS T_IDENTIFYNO, T.OEM_CODE AS OEMCODE, T.TMODEL_CODE,T.TID,VEHICLE_NO,TD.DVR_SIMNUM,V.VIN_CODE, V.ENT_ID FROM TB_SIM M INNER JOIN TR_SERVICEUNIT S ON S.SID = M.SID INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON V.VID = S.VID INNER JOIN TB_TERMINAL T ON T.TID = S.TID INNER JOIN KCPT.TB_DVR TD ON TD.DVR_ID = S.DVR_ID WHERE V.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND T.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND (M.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR M.CREATE_TIME >= ? OR S.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR S.CREATE_TIME >= ? OR V.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR V.CREATE_TIME >= ? OR T.UPDATE_TIME >= ? OR T.CREATE_TIME >= ? OR TD.UPDATE_TIME >=? OR TD.CREATE_TIME >=?)

SELECT TV.ENT_ID,TV.VID FROM (SELECT T.ENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.ENABLE_FLAG != '0' AND T.ENT_TYPE = 2 START WITH T.PARENT_ID = '1' CONNECT BY PRIOR T.ENT_ID = T.PARENT_ID) ET, KCPT.TB_VEHICLE TV WHERE TV.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND TV.VEHICLE_STATE = '2' AND TV.ENT_ID = ET.ENT_ID

property.name: sql_queryOrgAlarmCodeMap
property.desc: 查询企业对应报警设置SQL

config.property: SELECT ENT_ID,','||ALARM_CODE || ',' AS ALARM_CODE FROM (SELECT ENT_ID,TO_CHAR(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(ALARM_CODE)) ALARM_CODE FROM MVIEW_ALARM_CONF T GROUP BY ENT_ID) A

property.name: sql_orgParentSync
property.desc: 同步所有上级企业编号SQL

config.property: SELECT ORG.ENT_ID AS MOTORCADE,(SELECT WM_CONCAT(T.ENT_ID) FROM TB_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND T.ENT_TYPE = 1 START WITH T.ENT_ID = ORG.PARENT_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR T.PARENT_ID = T.ENT_ID) PARENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION ORG WHERE ORG.ENABLE_FLAG = '1' AND ORG.ENT_TYPE = 2

property.name: sql_updateLastTrackLine
property.desc: 轨迹包带总线数据更新最后位置到数据库

property.name: sql_updateLastTrackALine
property.desc: 轨迹包带总线数据更新最后位置到数据库SQL

property.name: sql_updateLastTrack
property.desc: 轨迹包更新最后位置到数据库SQL

property.name: sql_updateLastTrackA
property.desc: 轨迹包更新最后位置到数据库SQL

property.name: sql_updateVehicleLineStatus
property.desc: 更新最后位置表车辆上下线状态SQL

config.property: UPDATE TH_VEHICLE_STATUS SET GATHER_TIME = ?,TERMINAL_STATUS=?,TERMINAL_STATUS_VALUE=?,GPS_STATUS=?,GPS_STATUS_VALUE=?,E_WATER_TEMP_STATUS=DECODE(?,-1,E_WATER_TEMP_STATUS,?),E_WATER_TEMP=DECODE(?,-1,E_WATER_TEMP,?),EXT_VOLTAGE_STATUS=DECODE(?,-1,EXT_VOLTAGE_STATUS,?),EXT_VOLTAGE=DECODE(?,-1,EXT_VOLTAGE,?),OIL_PRESSURE_STATUS=?,OIL_PRESSURE=?,BRAKE_PRESSURE_STAUTS=?,BRAKE_PRESSURE=?,BRAKEPAD_FRAY_STATUS=?,BRAKEPAD_FRAY=?,OIL_ALARM_STATUS=?,OIL_ALARM=?,ABS_BUG_STATUS=?,ABS_BUG=?,COOLANT_LEVEL_STATUS=?,COOLANT_LEVEL=?,AIR_FILTER_CLOG_STATUS=?,AIR_FILTER_CLOG=?,MWERE_BLOCKING_STATUS=?,MWERE_BLOCKING=?,FUEL_BLOCKING_STATUS=?,FUEL_BLOCKING_ALARM=?,EOIL_TEMPERATURE_ALARM_STATUS=?,EOIL_TEMPERATURE_ALARM=?,RETARDER_HT_ALARM_STATUS=?,RETARDER_HT_ALARM=?,EHOUSING_HT_ALARM_STATUS=?,EHOUSING_HT_ALARM=?,VEHICLE_STATUS=?,AIR_PRESSURE_STATUS=DECODE(?,-1,AIR_PRESSURE_STATUS,?),AIR_PRESSURE=DECODE(?,-1,AIR_PRESSURE,?),GPS_FAULT_STATUS=?,GPS_FAULT=?,GPS_OPENCIRCUIT_STATUS=?,GPS_OPENCIRCUIT=?,GPS_SHORTCIRCUIT_STATUS=?,GPS_SHORTCIRCUIT=?,TEMINAL_UNDERVOLTAGE_STATUS=?,TEMINAL_UNDERVOLTAGE=?,TEMINAL_POWERDOWN_STATUS=?,TEMINAL_POWERDOWN=?,TEMINAL_SCREENFAULT_STATUS=?,TEMINAL_SCREENFAULT=?,TTS_FAULT_STATUS=?,TTS_FAULT=?,CAMERA_FAULT_STATUS=?,CAMERA_FAULT=? WHERE VID=?

property.name: sql_updateOnOfflineStatus
property.desc: 更新最后位置表车辆上下线状态SQL

config.property: SELECT V.VID, TERMINAL_STATUS_VALTYPE,MIN_TERMINAL_STATUS,MAX_TERMINAL_STATUS, GPS_STATUS_VALTYPE,MIN_GPS_STATUS,MAX_GPS_STATUS, E_WATER_TEMP_VALTYPE,MIN_E_WATER_TEMP,MAX_E_WATER_TEMP, EXT_VOLTAGE_VALTYPE,MIN_EXT_VOLTAGE,MAX_EXT_VOLTAGE, OIL_PRESSURE_VALTYPE,MIN_OIL_PRESSURE,MAX_OIL_PRESSURE, BRAKE_PRESSURE_VALTYPE,MIN_BRAKE_PRESSURE,MAX_BRAKE_PRESSURE, BRAKEPAD_FRAY_VALTYPE,MIN_BRAKEPAD_FRAY,MAX_BRAKEPAD_FRAY, OIL_ALARM_VALTYPE,MIN_OIL_ALARM,MAX_OIL_ALARM,ABS_BUG_VALTYPE, MIN_ABS_BUG,MAX_ABS_BUG,COOLANT_LEVEL_VALTYPE,MIN_COOLANT_LEVEL, MAX_COOLANT_LEVEL,AIR_FILTER_CLOG_VALTYPE,MIN_AIR_FILTER_CLOG, MAX_AIR_FILTER_CLOG,MWERE_BLOCKING_VALTYPE,MIN_MWERE_BLOCKING, MAX_MWERE_BLOCKING,FUEL_BLOCKING_VALTYPE,MIN_FUEL_BLOCKING, MAX_FUEL_BLOCKING,EOIL_TEMPERATURE_VALTYPE,MIN_EOIL_TEMPERATURE_ALARM, MAX_EOIL_TEMPERATURE_ALARM,RETARDER_HT_ALARM_VALTYPE,MIN_RETARDER_HT_ALARM, MAX_RETARDER_HT_ALARM,EHOUSING_HT_ALARM_VALTYPE,MIN_EHOUSING_HT_ALARM ,MAX_EHOUSING_HT_ALARM,AIR_PRESSURE_VALTYPE,MIN_AIR_PRESSURE,MAX_AIR_PRESSURE FROM TB_VSTATUS_REF S INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON S.VS_REF_ID = V.VS_REF_ID WHERE V.ENABLE_FLAG='1' AND V.VID = ?

property.name: sql_queryLineStationBind
property.desc: 查询线路站点绑定列表SQL

config.property: SELECT LV.VID,L.LINE_ID,S.STATION_ID,LS.STATION_NUMBER,L.OPERATION_UP_OR_DOWN AS LINE_DIRECTION,S.MAPLON,S.MAPLAT,S.STATION_RADIUS FROM KCPT.TB_CLASS_LINE L JOIN KCPT.TR_LINE_STATION LS ON L.LINE_ID = LS.LINE_ID AND L.ENABLE_FLAG=1 AND L.OPERATE_TYPE = 3 JOIN KCPT.TB_LINE_STATION S ON LS.STATION_ID=S.STATION_ID AND S.ENABLE_FLAG=1 JOIN KCPT.TR_LINE_VEHICLE LV ON L.LINE_ID=LV.CLASS_LINE_ID AND (LV.LINE_STATUS = 2 OR (LV.SEND_COMMAND_STATUS = 0 AND LV.LINE_STATUS = 1) OR (LV.SEND_COMMAND_STATUS != 0 AND LV.LINE_STATUS = 3)) ORDER BY VID

cron.desc: 报警设置缓存更新规则
车辆信息缓存更新规则
站点信息缓存更新规则
